reviewText: Love the books (oh please you must read these if you are a reader), but not so hot on this film version.  The Inspector is all wrong, I just can't believe this actor as him.  Nice try on the story line though, all the pertinent themes are there.
Je n'attendais pas que ce film soit si bon.  Maintenant Adamsberg, Danglard, et Camille ont des visages.  Le film noir comme il doit etre.
